titles.title: Legal Immigration Extension Act of 2008
A bill to extend immigration programs to promote legal immigration and for other purposes.

action.text: Read the first time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Read the First Time.

calendar.text: Read the second time. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 875.

bill.summary: 7/11/2008--Introduced. Legal Immigration Extension Act of 2008 - Extends: (1) the EB-5 regional center pilot program; (2) the Conrad state 30 program; (3) the special immigrant nonminister religious worker program; and (4) the E-Verify program.
